top.headline: クレジットを全ての人へというソーリューション
top.footnote: まもなく販売予定が発表されます！

purpose.headline: Swapy Networkによって実現を目指す私たちの夢は、誰もが新規参入しやすい 効率的なクレジット市場を提供し、消費者にこそクレジットを全ての人へ”のメリットを届けることです。
purpose.exchangeDescription: Swapyエクスチェンジは、金利が低い国に住む投資家と、金利が高い国に住むクレジット会社をつなぐことで、前者にはより高い還元を、後者にはより低い資本コストを提供します。
purpose.finIdDescription: SwapyファイナンシャルIDは、個人に力を与えます。世界中、いつでもどこでも有効なファイナンシャルIDを提供します。
purpose.dataMarketDescription: Swapyデータマーケットでは、ユーザーの信用情報を情報保有者の価値に変換できます。これからの時代は、個人が自分の個人情報を管理し、誰にどの情報を公開し、公開と引き換えにいくらトークンを受け取るかを決めます。
purpose.title-end: Swapy Network is a decentralized platform that aims to provide Universal Access to Credit.

benefits.headline: Swapy Network Benefits
benefits.benefit1: Reduced cost of capital on emerging nations
benefits.benefit4: Individuals have the rights and reap the value of their own data
benefits.benefit5: Easily accessible and lower cost financial data source

roadmap.headline: Swapy Roadmap
roadmap.1p1: The Swapy’s software development has started since July 1st, 2017.
roadmap.1p2: On July 31st, we released our Swapy Exchange private alpha as an preview containing the fund raising contracts.
roadmap.2p1: On October 10th, we released Swapy Exchange public alpha on Ropsten test net, and open-sourced our protocol.
roadmap.2p2: Since then we are developing side features for the fund raising flow, auditing our code base and removing the dependency of a centralized login service.
roadmap.2p3: By mid-december, we will be releasing an updated version of the Swapy Exchange D’App.
roadmap.3p1: Swapy Financial ID public alpha on test net providing identification and attestation to Swapy Exchange tokenized assets.
roadmap.3p2: Swapy Data Market private alpha on test net operating 1 to 1 data sales.
roadmap.4p1: Swapy Exchange and Swapy Financial ID private beta on main net transacting real tokens.
roadmap.4p2: *Each credit company we are negotiating with will have their own timeline to start using the Swapy Exchange depending on the compliance process.
roadmap.5p1: Swapy Exchange and Swapy Financial ID public beta on main net. Public “Connect with Swapy ID” API available. Anyone can use for any purpose and transact real tokens.
roadmap.5p2: Swapy Data Market on private beta transacting real tokens and real data from Swapy Financial ID.
roadmap.6p1: Swapy Data Market public beta on main net.
roadmap.6p2: Swapy Exchange and Swapy Financial ID improvements.
roadmap.6p3: Planning the following year considering the community surveys.

endorsements.headline: Swapy Endorsements
endorsements.quote1: Very exciting to see Swapy Network going after cheaper credit and student loans. Clever solution.
endorsements.quote2: Blockchain will fundamentally change the way we access credit. Proud to be supporting Swapy Network as they make that vision a reality.
